abstract: ESPN permanently drops Hank Williams Jr's opening song to Monday Night Football after country music singer makes an analogy to Hitler while talking about President Obama.
snippet: ESPN said it decided to part ways with the country singer Hank Williams Jr. after he made an analogy about Hitler in a comment about President Obama.
lead_paragraph: ESPN said it decided to part ways with the country singer Hank Williams Jr. after he made an analogy about Hitler in a comment about President Obama.

headline.main: ESPN Permanently Drops Football Pregame Song
headline.print_headline: ESPN Permanently Drops Football Pregame Song
headline.seo: Hank Williams Jr. Dropped Permanently From ‘Monday Night Football’
